title: Fahira Jaya Aspal
description: This is my first job in the field of freelancing. I have encountered many challenges, from UI/UX design to backend+development. However, through these experiences, I have learned effective problem-solving skills and have become more creative

title: E-monitoring & E-evaluasi
description: E-monitoring & E-evaluation is an application designed to monitor and evaluate the data of schools and teachers in the Maluku province that have conducted the Computer-Based National Examination (UNBK).

title: Smart Office Maluku
description: Smart Office Maluku is an office application for the Maluku region, aimed at facilitating permissions and statements. My role involved fixing some bugs and adding several new features.

title: Gemesaku
description: Gemesaku is a government program application by the Cirebon Regency aimed at enhancing the quality of reading culture in Cirebon.

title: Piutang App
description: Piutang App is an application for both inventory management and debt recording.

title: Mandiri Technology Sejahtera
description: This application contains the profile of CV. Mandiri Technology Sejahtera, aimed at improving the quality of their services and products.

title: Payroll App
description: Payroll App is a payroll, attendance, and employee scheduling application developed by PT. Arjuna Petrogas Indonesia.
